kou commented on pull request #3933: ARROW-4882: [GLib] Add sum functions
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3933#discussion_r266194874
 
 

 ##########
 File path: c_glib/arrow-glib/basic-array.cpp
 ##########
 @@ -1039,6 +1048,32 @@ garrow_int8_array_get_values(GArrowInt8Array *array,
   return garrow_array_get_values_raw<arrow::Int8Type>(arrow_array, length);
 }
 
+/**
+ * garrow_int8_array_sum:
+ * @array: A #GArrowInt8Array.
+ * @error: (nullable): Return location for a #GError or %NULL.
+ *
+ * Returns: Returns: The value of the computed sum on success,
+ *   0 on error.
 
 Review comment:
   "0 on error" is misleading. 0 is one of a valid value. Users should not use 0 as an error indicator.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

+ * @error: (nullable): Return location for a #GError or %NULL.
+ *

+ *   0 on error.
 
 Review comment:
   Note that it may also return NULL, and this should not be an error, so the "true" return type is `option<T>`.

 }
 
+/**
+ * garrow_int8_array_sum:

+ * @error: (nullable): Return location for a #GError or %NULL.
+ *
+ * Returns: Returns: The value of the computed sum on success,
+ *   0 on error.
 
 Review comment:
   I've added.
   We use zero for the case because we can't implement `option<T>` in C for primitive types.
